title: The Love Detective
description: "People always ask me what kind of books I write and I guess you'd call them love stories, but I also think of them as mysteries. After all, what makes two people fall in love? I've written three novels on the topic and I'm still looking for the answers.In a way, I'm a bit of a love detective. Because what's a greater mystery than love?"Ruby Miller has lost her faith in love. In an effort to forget her cheating ex and clear her writer's block, she joins her sister for a week's holiday in India... and embarks on an extraordinary adventure.Swept up on a magical mystery tour, amid silks and spices, palaces and weddings, Ruby investigates different stories of love lost and found.But will a romance of her own remain always out of reach? Or can she find her happy ever after?
author: Alexandra Potter
